{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Phorus |model=Play-Fi |revision=Player |upc=741459099671 |ean=0741459099671 |asin=B007RFLJ92 |fcc_date=07/09/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Lite-On |type=wireless speaker system |fcc_id=PPQ-PLAYFIP1, PPQ-PLAYFIR1 |ic_id=4491A-PLAYFIP1 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=3.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=1.3 |pwr_barrel_len=8 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88AP162 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=64 |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=H27U518S2CTR-BC |fla2=4 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX29LV320EBTI-70G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS1G63EFR-S5C |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_module=AzureWave AW-NH387L |wi1_module_if=SDIO (module) |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8787 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |addl_chips=Mixed-Signal Microcontroller;TI;MSP430F5501;;1;,,, Stereo Digital Amplifier w/ DSPs and FM Synth;Yamaha;YDA156-V;;1;,,, 96kHz 24-bit stereo A/D Converter;Asahi Kasei;AK5358A;;1;,,, Dual Operational Amplifier;Unisonic Technologies;MC4580L;;1;,,, Bluetooth v2.1 Single Chip Radio;CSR;CSR57E6;;1;,,, Low-Voltage 4-Bit 1-of-2 FET Multiplexer/Demultiplexer;TI;SN74CBTLV3257;;1;,,, 23V, 2A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;ZillTek;ZT7812S;;3;,,, 28V, 3A Step-Down Converter;Monolithic Power Systems;MPS1584EN;;1;,,, 1A Low Dropout Linear Regulator;AXElite Technology;AX1117;;1;,,, |flags=Bluetooth 3.0, Audio in (3.5mm), |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |oui=60:B6:06 }} {{TagLine|Phorus Play-Fi Speaker}} <!--{{lovercase}}-->
